URGENT ACTION REQUIRED: Your Legalzoom Order # XXXXXXX ? Second set of questions for your 501c3
Dear {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Thank you for sending us the previously requested information regarding your 501c3. Based on the information you provided, we need additional information from you. Please follow the steps listed below to complete your order.
Next steps: ?Complete the attached application using Microsoft Word ? Review and/or revise the attached budget using Microsoft Excel ?Email completed responses as attachments in MS Word/MS Excel format to nonprofit@legalzoom.com.
For MAC users: - Please ensure the name of the file has the PC-appropriate extension (i.e. Document.DOC or Document.XLS) - Save documents as an appropriate file type - Email your responses as an attachment
Using any other software formats will result in delays with your order. In addition, we cannot accept these documents via fax and/or hardcopy mail.
It is very important that your answers are complete and detailed as much as possible. IRS carefully scrutinizes every application before approval and does not accept generalization. If your answers are generic and/or lack detail, IRS can delay the approval of your 501c3.
Your urgent action will enable us to complete your order in a timely manner
Note: We cannot proceed without your response
If you have any questions regarding your order, please contact our Customer Care Department at (800) 773-0888 or nonprofit@legalzoom.com. Please include your order number in your correspondences for prompt service.
Best regards,
